data.title: BNI Southern Colorado - Local Business. Global Network.
data.meta_description: BNI Southern Colorado's Mission is to help members businesses large and small, grow their business and make more money!. BNI Website BNI Southern Colorado - Local Business. Global Network. page for Southern Colorado in English (US)
data.text:
Welcome to BNI Southern Colorado

BNI of Southern Colorado has been making network success happen for Southern Colorado business owners and entrepreneurs since 1985. The BNI business networking model has proven successful for nearly forty years because of our unique commitment to the success of the whole group and our principal core value, Givers Gain®.

Each week, thousands of communities across the globe meet within their local chapters to build and nurture long-lasting business relationships and BNI Southern Colorado proudly offers the training, peer learning, and networking opportunities to members of our chapters.

BNI ® Changing the Way the World Does Business

Business Networking International Southern Colorado is on a mission to help businesses large and small grow to meet their fullest potential. BNI culture is built around relationships and referrals as a core value reflected in Givers Gain ®.

BNI builds business through a structured professional marketing program that offers the opportunity to:
